summary: The media tag encompasses resources that intersect with various domains such as design, coding, music, and dance, under the umbrella of ecosystem architecture. This practice combines decentralization and regenerative design principles to foster non-natural ecosystems. Drawing on diverse fields, it aims to create and nurture healthy, distributed, and asynchronous networks and communities. This tag highlights innovative approaches and interdisciplinary practices in the realm of media.
excerpt: Ecosystem architecture merges decentralization with regenerative design, leveraging diverse fields to build and sustain healthy, distributed networks and communities.
